000110 00000 00000 00001 00000 000000   # in $r1
111111 00001 000000000000000110000      # asrt $r1 48(= 0)

000110 00000 00000 00010 00000 000000   # in $r2
111111 00010 000000000000000001010      # asrt $r2 10(= LF)

000110 00000 00000 00011 00000 000000   # in $r3
111111 00011 000000000000000110001      # asrt $r3 49(= 1)

000110 00000 00000 00100 00000 000000   # in $r4
111111 00100 000000000000000110010      # asrt $r4 50(= 2)

000110 00000 00000 00101 00000 000000   # in $r5
111111 00101 000000000000000100000      # asrt $r5 32(= <space>)

000110 00000 00000 00110 00000 000000   # in $r6
111111 00110 000000000000000111001      # asrt $r6 57(= 9)

000110 00000 00000 00111 00000 000000   # in $r7
111111 00111 000000000000000001010      # asrt $r7 10(= LF)

000110 00000 00000 01000 00000 000000   # in $r8
111111 01000 000000000000001100001      # asrt $r8 97(= a)

000110 00000 00000 01001 00000 000000   # in $r9
111111 01001 000000000000000001010      # asrt $r9 10(= LF)

000110 00000 00000 01010 00000 000000   # in $r10
111111 01010 000000000000001100010      # asrt $r10 98(= b)

000110 00000 00000 01011 00000 000000   # in $r11
111111 01011 000000000000001100011      # asrt $r11 99(= c)

000110 00000 00000 01100 00000 000000   # in $r12
111111 01100 000000000000000100000      # asrt $r12 32(= <space>)

000110 00000 00000 01101 00000 000000   # in $r13
111111 01101 000000000000001111010      # asrt $r13 122(= z)

000101 00000 00000 00000 00000 000000   # halt
